channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Beyond Climate Policy: The Economy-Wide Repercussions of Eliminating the Greenhouse Gas Reporting Program
item.description: A new proposal to repeal the Greenhouse Gas Reporting Program would materially harm U.S. competitiveness and financial market efficiency while putting billions of dollars in annual U.S. investments at risk.
